title: PB Training - Serena Hotels
author: HBL Content
summary: The PB Training document outlines various alliances and tactical campaigns related to HBL Cards, highlighting merchants offering discounts to cardholders. Vintage Gallery, located in Karachi, boasts the largest collection of antiquities in Pakistan, with discounts ranging from 10% to 20% based on the type of HBL card used. Discounts include 10% for Green Credit and Classic Debit Cards, 15% for Gold Credit and Gold or Titanium Debit Cards, and 20% for Platinum Credit and World Debit Cards. The offer is valid until December 2020. Lal Qila in Hyderabad is a restaurant that offers a Mughal-era dining experience, providing authentic Mughlai and Pakistani cuisines. Similar to Vintage Gallery, it offers discounts of 10% for Green, Gold Credit, Classic, Gold, and Titanium Debit Cards, and 15% for Platinum Credit and World Debit Cards, also expiring in December 2020. Big Thick Burgerz, also located in Karachi, specializes in meaty burgers and offers the same discount structure as the previous merchants, providing 10% and 15% discounts based on card types until December 2020. Additionally, the document details tactical campaigns for two merchants. Pie In The Sky, operating in Karachi and Hyderabad, offers a 40% discount on cakes and bakery items exclusively on December 25, 2019, capped at PKR 1,500. Habitt, a nationwide retailer, provides a 20% discount on home accessories and furniture during a three-day campaign from December 20 to 23, 2019, excluding mattresses, electronic appliances, and outdoor furniture.
